name: alien
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ before noun ] relating to creatures from another planet: an alien spacecraft Synonym
extraterrestrial
strange and not familiar: When I first went to New York, it all felt very alien to me.
coming from a different country, race, or group: an alien culture Synonym
foreign

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Unknown and unfamiliar
a creature from a different planet: He believes that aliens visit Earth in UFOs. In this story, the spaceship comes into contact with a society of friendly aliens.
law
  specialized someone who lives in a country of which they are not a legal citizen: When war broke out, the government rounded up thousands of aliens and put them in temporary camps.

Add to word list
a person who lives in a country but is not a citizen (= member of a country with specific rights)
An alien is also a creature from a planet other than Earth.
coming from a different country, race, or group; foreign: alien customs
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who lives in a foreign country of which they are not a citizen: illegal aliens See also
resident alien alien adjective [ before noun ]
They are recommending that long-term alien workers should be granted citizenship.
